text: The men's 200 metres at the 2010 European Athletics Championships was held at the Estadi Olímpic Lluís Companys on 29 and 30 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style=" text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Christophe Lemaitre France (FRA) |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Christian Malcolm Great Britain (GBR) |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Martial Mbandjock France (FRA) |} ==Records== {| class="wikitable" width=75% |- !colspan="5"|Standing records prior to the 2010 European Athletics Championships |- |World record | |19.19 |Berlin, Germany |20 August 2009 |- |European record | |19.72 |Mexico City, Mexico |12 September 1979 |- |Championship record | |19.85 |Munich, Germany |9 August 2002 |- |World Leading | |19.56 |Kingston, Jamaica |1 May 2010 |- |European Leading | |20.16 |Valence, France |10 July 2010 |} ==Schedule== {| class="wikitable" ! Date ! Time !
